thought: To solve this task I need to craft an emerald block. Emerald blocks require placing 9 emeralds in a 3x3 square in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the emerald from slot 38 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1
